- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Michelle, Sure thing, also we can do the appointment via phone (just you and me) and then set up a separate time to meet in person with Heidi. Its totally up to you guys. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Michelle Entrepreneur [mailto:michellelhaley@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, December 31, 2012 3:49 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Heidi Everett Subject: Re: A 2013 MBO Associate Hi Sara, Thanks for the reminder. I'll check out your schedule tomorrow to get a date on the calendar. Heidi, when are you planning on going back in? Thanks and happy New Year! M
Sent from M's iPhone
